Package controller

Class Appointments

java.lang.Object
controller.Appointments
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Appointments extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Appointments Class provides control for the main Appointments screen.
Author:
Joseph Merritt
